name: IBM QRadar
description: IBMB. QRadarB. SIEM helps uncover security risks by analyzing and correlating log and networks events.

options.name: IBM QRadar Server URL
options.description: The URL for your IBM QRadar server which should include the schema (i.e., http, https) and port if required

options.name: Username
options.description: The username of the IBM QRadar user you want the integration to authenticate as

options.name: password
options.description: The password for the provided username you want the integration to authenticate as

options.name: Ignore Private IPs
options.description: If set to true, private IPs (RFC 1918 addresses) will not be looked up (includes 127.0.0.1, 0.0.0.0, and 255.255.255.255)

options.name: Minimum Severity Level
options.description: The minimum severity level required for indicators to be displayed

options.name: Open Offenses Only
options.description: If set to true, only offenses with a status value of 'OPEN' will be searched
